Admin dashboard place holder
Replace this file with a self contained admin dashboard (CSS,html)

Find a free a template
this looks good:
https://github.com/adminkit/adminkit
demo: https://demo.adminkit.io/index.html

We only need two pages
Jobs page -
rows of jobs. Like this
https://demo.adminkit.io/pages-clients.html
one row per job
with a switch to approve each job and a link to preview it and another link to open a page to edit it.

Users page -

rows of users (same template)
one row per user
switch to approve users and another switch to approve a profile, name and link to profile.
